page.title: 13 HOME LIFE
page.content: { HOME LIFE}:Simon, age 11. An average{Saturday}in my life: My alarm rings at about 7.30am. but you will find me already reading until about 9.00am. It is usually a {C.S. { {Lewis book,}or one by{Roald Dahl.}My breakfast is normally cereal or toast and jam. The best thing about Saturday is my favourite hobby-{cycling.}Often my cousin comes along and we go to rhe top of our field and into the woods. Saturday afternoon can bring one of the worst things of my life-{shopping with my mother. I hate all the waiting around. After tea I watch{television especially in winter. In summer I like to mess about on{our farm}until I go to bed at 10.30pm.-long past my normal bedtime.
